website_summaries.verdict: If you want a neat, contemporary-looking bar cabinet, look no further. Holds up to 18 wine bottles.
pros: We're big fans of the accented wood grain top and racks, and matte black finish that's complemented with stylish pewter hardware
Includes two storage drawers and two shelves behind the doors
cons: Some users found assembly confusing due to the large number of different components

customer_reviews.title: Tv unit with fireplace
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love this tv stand!! I’m sitting on the couch quite far back and I can feel the warmth of the fireplace already. The unit itself is just beautiful I’m very happy with my purchase!! Dec. 8, 2018. The fireplace is still producing heat I use it all the time. Best purchase for an electric fireplace. 🙂
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly F. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality, worse seller
customer_reviews.text: Poor fit and finish. The middle plank of the table top was bowed out. The worst thought was the strong chemical smell. That was too much to deal with. I contacted the seller OJCommerce for a refund and found they wanted a restocking fee plus return shipping. All in all it would cost me about $140 to return a $117 table... under no circumstances would I buy from this seller again
customer_reviews.author: kdmsu13

customer_reviews.title: Great ambiance
customer_reviews.text: Fell in love with this piece when I saw it in a popular furniture site but it was under a different brand name and cost $100 more! When I saw it on Amazon I immediately ordered and had it in 2 days! Took several Hours for my husband to put together by himself but he said it was well planned Out and not difficult. Love the ambiance this creates. Bought it for a tv stand in our master bedroom. The top is slightly textured. Shelves are the wood look as well.
customer_reviews.author: RubySoho

customer_reviews.title: Just what we wanted!
customer_reviews.text: Assembly wasn’t too bad. It’s very sturdy and looks GREAT! Plenty of space for our gaming consoles, DVR & remotes/accessories. The fireplace is gorgeous and when you turn the heat option on, it does a great job of keeping the room warm! We especially love the wood-grain look on the top and back panels.
customer_reviews.author: Natassia

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous Coffee Table
customer_reviews.text: -I'm absolutely IN LOVE with my new coffee table. It looks so good in my space now, and for the price.. you can't beat it! It was fairly easy to put together, took no more than 30 minutes for me (and yes, I did it by myself!). Once I had it together, it made my living room look That much better! Love the finish on it, easy to clean and Looks Great! Well Done, Altra Furniture/Ameriwood Home Carver Coffee Table!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Osborne

customer_reviews.title: I love it 100%
customer_reviews.text: I love it 100%. I have a 50in tv on it. It took forever to put together and it definitely was tedious but totally worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Breyana M.

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking and not to difficult to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: When I first opened the box it was a little intimidating to see all the parts. But once I looked over the instructions and followed them; the assembly was not difficult. It took about an hour to assemble the table with the help of my 14 year old son <3. The table is about 90lbs so I liked the weight of it. It's pretty sturdy however I would not let a person sit on it (which is why I rated 4 stars). This is table is exactly what I wanted and it looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Anna M

customer_reviews.title: GARBAGE!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This table is garbage. The top is like paper. My wife was wrapping Christmas gifts and put a piece of scotch tape on the corner. She pulled the tape off and the table top came with it. It’s cheap crap. Do not buy anything from Ameriwood. We bought 2 other items and they were worse than this. This might be the worst company ever!!
customer_reviews.author: Tommy C.

customer_reviews.title: I love this table it's very sturdy and looks great for ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this table it's very sturdy and looks great for such a cheap price however there was a small chip in the wood not to noticeable would have gave it 5 if it wasn't for the chip
customer_reviews.author: Sherrie b.

customer_reviews.title: Great Looking Fireplace/TV Stand Cabinet
customer_reviews.text: Overall the cabinet is beautiful and the fireplace works great. It's well designed, and looks like a quality piece of furniture. Missing a star for two significant blemishes in the white paint. I'll be able to fix them since there is no damage to the underlying wood. Assembly was straight forward and all pieces aligned perfectly. I did have to study the instruction drawings carefully to ensure the frame pieces were not upside down or flipped end to end. The fireplace works great. It allows you to set the temp, set a timer, adjust the lighting, run without heat, etc. Very happy customer with the the end product.
customer_reviews.author: Tommy T

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for...
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice but it is extremely cheap. It is covered with a paper like design for the “distressed” look. I placed corner protectors on all of my tables because I have a toddler and this was the only one where they completely peeled off and did damage. You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Marie Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Wish there was something I can do with the damage
customer_reviews.text: The cabinet itself is pretty great though it did come damaged. All of the bigger pieces at the corners were smashed in. After opening I wasn't really able to put everything back into the box orderly and I don't really have the strength or car space to drop this off at a return center. The manufacturer's website didn't work for me, do I did the only thing I could, putting this together with the damaged pieces. The instructions were great. No missing pieces. I don't feel like I got my money's worth with the busted corners and all, but it's a good cabinet if yours come undamaged. I'll have to somehow jazz up busted parts.
customer_reviews.author: L33chwife

customer_reviews.title: ABSOLUTE GARBAGE!!! DO NOT BUY THIS TABLE!!!
customer_reviews.text: This table is very poor quality and comes in a MILLION PIECES. This IKEA WANNABE is made from the CHEAPEST MATERIALS THAT LITERALLY BREAK IN YOUR HAND IN THE ASSEMBLY PROCESS. I had to go to Home Depot and buy wood glue, clamps and screws to make up for all the broken pieces and cheap hardware. Both the table top and bottom shelf comes in 3 pieces each, and looks like cheap crap. The first time they sent me the table it was damaged in transit, and I had to wait for Amazon to send me another one. THIS IS A LOUSY PRODUCT MADE FROM CHEAP MATERIALS, AND ITS A NIGHTMARE TO BUILD. DO NOT BUY THIS TABLE!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas A. Casale

customer_reviews.title: A Beautiful Table.
customer_reviews.text: Okay, I absolutely love this table. I got it for our living room, and it looks even more expensive than I thought it would. It seriously took me like three hours to assemble, and it was missing a small piece, but it was beautiful when it was all put together. It's very sturdy. It doesn't show stains. And it's made our living room look so much better. I DID hit my leg on the corner shortly after putting it up, and it gouged me pretty bad. I got those rubber edge things for the sides, so I wouldn't hurt myself, and the kids would be okay. Just a thought for people with kids.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Lasted Eight Months
customer_reviews.text: Purchased July 14, 2018. Died April 3, 2019. RIP little fireplace credenza. I really, really enjoyed this piece... while it lived. I used the fireplace several times a week, just because I really liked the looks of it. Today I came home and pointed the remote at it and pressed the button. Nothing. Put fresh, new batteries in the remote and pressed the button. Nothing. There is no way to operate the unit without the remote. I’m totally bummed. Might as well have thrown my $300 out the window. Totally regret this horrible purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy Bell

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I was super nervous ordering this coffee table due to the price! I was concerned it wouldn’t be heavy enough. However, upon receiving the box at my front door and barely being able to lift it inside, my worries ceased a bit. Putting it together was easy enough for one person. The quality is exceptional for $143, but the pieces could fit together better in some spots (though not overly noticeable). Overall, I am happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Emilee D

customer_reviews.title: Stylish piece
customer_reviews.text: The customer service was excellent! I ordered this back in March to match the coffee table and end tables I have of the same brand. I had previously put together the tables so I knew what to expect when putting this tv stand together. Took me and my mom 4hrs to put together. When it came time to put the cabinet doors on I noticed they weren't glass doors like I saw in the advertisement so I called Ameriwood customer service and they stated they would send out the correct doors.
customer_reviews.author: T. Coleman

customer_reviews.title: Look for damage.
customer_reviews.text: I recieved table began to unbox and almost every piece is damaged. Try to fill out the page online for replacement parts but wont let me finish because its asking for all these different numbers that are not on anything I had received. Called and sat on hold for 30 minutes for them to tell me to fill out the online page again for replacement parts. Disappointed because it looks like it would have been a super nice table but it's all beat up. Will continue to try and get in touch with someone because I spent alot of money on it and either want a refund or a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the assembly effort!  Nice piece
customer_reviews.text: Extremely nice piece, very cool finishes inside. We used it for a business application, had to drill vents out the back - but I may buy one for my own home. Assembly took about 3 days (after getting hot, sweaty and irritated and quitting for the day 2 times). The directions could use some work - the draw runners got put on wrong due to poor directions. All parts for assembly were accounted for, so that was good.
customer_reviews.author: DS

customer_reviews.title: Great table!
customer_reviews.text: This table is perfect! Great value, very sturdy and durable! It's beautiful and fits the decor of our new home perfectly. I was nervous about purchasing online without seeing it or touching it first, but I'm so glad we did! Easy to put together, too.
customer_reviews.author: Adkins

customer_reviews.title: Never buying furniture off Amazon again. Go to a real store!
customer_reviews.text: I'll preface by saying I'm extremely handy and have built tons of bedroom sets/furniture in my life POS. Holes are drilled different sizes for the same screw and the wood cracks as you tighten them. I buy a ton from Amazon but I will never buy any furniture type product again. This is junk.
customer_reviews.author: Steelstorm

customer_reviews.title: Overall good purchase, had some issues with shipping
customer_reviews.text: So overally this is a great table, it's very roomy, and was easy to put together. We did experience an issue with shipping, it went back and forth a lot and was delivered later than expected and apparently dropped a few times because the table did have minor damage when it arrived but for the price we just colored the chipped corners in with a furniture marker. It holds a lot and is very spacious, I would recommend it for great value and just hope you have a better shipped my experience.
customer_reviews.author: Chrystal

customer_reviews.title: Not easy to build, but worth it.
customer_reviews.text: This makes for a pretty item. The build requires some work, but once you have got that covered, it is sturdy. Build it carefully because it is specific. Example, to mount your fireplace, you will want to make sure the trim pieces are on right side up, so that the predrilled screw holes are on the correct side. Do it wrong, and you will have to make new ones, because taking it apart to correct this would be a pain. Other sections too. It is versatile, in that you can put whatever stuff you like on it. Stereo, movies, books, whatever along with your TV. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Selina1

customer_reviews.title: Assembly isn’t the best
customer_reviews.text: The table top and bottom come in 3 pieces. We were having the hardest time getting them to stick together with the little wooden dowels. The holes don’t perfectly line up. We had to barely insert the dowels in each side to manipulate it to fit. We have recently bought a lot of furniture we’ve had to put together and this was by far the worst simply based on that. We snapped a few dowels and there aren’t extra. Hopefully it stays together.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Easy instructions & well packaged
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited when it came a day early! Once I unpacked I loved that it was very well packaged so none of the materials were damaged anywhere. The instructions to assemble the table were super easy to read and I didn't needed any fancy tools just a screwdriver and a hammer. It took me about an hour as I do get side tracked with my kids so I am sure it can be done in less time. LOVE the look of this coffee table and would recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew S McCurley

customer_reviews.title: Nightmare to assemble!  Box weighs a ton
customer_reviews.text: IF you hate a major assembly project, do not buy this wood (particle board) coffee table! The box weighs a ton and has 100s of hardware pieces to assemble and it takes forever. Once completed, (if you make to the end) the table itself is nice (I have the black with grayish top). In hindsight I would just buy something locally already assembled at tjm or h goods and save my sanity and time!
customer_reviews.author: G

customer_reviews.title: Ummm YES! LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: When I saw this table I wasn’t so sure. Due to the fact that it’s a square rather than a rectangle table but I gave it a shot and I seriously do not regret it whatsoever! The table is sturdy, heavy, and very beautiful! Putting the table together was so easy. It took me and my fiancé about an hour and 15 minutes to put together. The directions were very clear, thorough and easy to follow. It also made our living room look a bigger as well. In the picture I posted, it looks small but it’s a very decent size. It’s definitely worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Win

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for?
customer_reviews.text: I put wall-safe tape on the corner to hold a garland/decoration, I took the tape off and the corner piece of the table is gone.. I'm sitting over here freaking out wondering if I tell the boyfriend how this happened or blame the kids. He was already mad about the little entertainment fireplace area we got having a bunch of chips, but now this.. same brand, same quality. His review didn't even get posted. It's cheap, sturdy.. but I guess you get what you pay for. Wouldn't recommend. This is my first ever negative review. Eek.💔
customer_reviews.author: nichole h.

customer_reviews.title: Great storage cabinet for the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a replacement to a different cabinet that I returned due to poor quality and lack of sturdiness. This cabinet looks much nicer and is much sturdier. I’m glad I made the decision to return and replace with this cabinet. The storage capacity is less, but I’m still able to store all of my dry goods. I would definitely recommend. The package arrived undamaged with no missing parts.
customer_reviews.author: SRD

customer_reviews.title: Fireplace insert is a fire hazard!
customer_reviews.text: I received this a few months ago. It is a beautiful piece. But unfortunately the fireplace insert is absolutely terrrible and unsafe. Within a few months it just stopped working completely. We took it apart to see if we could fix it, and it appears the wiring shorted out and actually caught on fire.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Poppy

customer_reviews.title: If you’re debating, just buy it! Absolutely worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful table, sturdy, lots of surface space (a little more than 3ftx3ft) and the same about of storage space underneath (only about 6inches tall though, so no storage cubes) and it’s absolutely worth the cost!!!! Best coffee table I’ve ever owned. My husband even installed a recessed socket with usb and cable ports ($8 here on amazon) on the side and it’s literally my dream table now. (Ignore the black cable in the picture, haven’t been able to hide it yet). You’re going to love this coffee table!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Chris & Kiana

customer_reviews.title: Not bad but not great for the money.
customer_reviews.text: There were some design flaws but still able to work. The feet are not made of that great of material. One of mine snapped in half... Some of the pieces also came a little scratched up. And a good bit of the holes didn’t line up just right. Also the doors aren’t exactly level. Another small detail that isn’t too big of a deal, the clips holding the glass in place show from the outside. Obviously something like that is not a huge deal. Putting the whole thing together took about 3.5 hours. For the money you spend on this one I believe you could find one of a little better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Assemble and Looks Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and a beautiful finish. I love the colors. Really pulls my room together and is so easy to put together. I can’t stress this enough, READ THE INSTRUCTIONS AND GRAB A PENCIL SO YOU CAN CHECK OFF EVERY STEP. Everyone wants to claim how difficult everything is to put together but I literally put all this together and I’m a 30 yr old woman. I literally just read the instructions and took my time.
customer_reviews.author: Chrissy

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Can't say enough about this table. Super easy to assemble, very sturdy and heavy, and beautiful! I've gotten so many compliments on it. It's also big enough to hold everything I need, and really makes my liking room feel warm and inviting. Absolutely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Barbs

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic coffee table
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my basement to replace a 2'x4' table that was scratched up. This immediately improved the room visually with a fantastic looking table. The grey wood looking planks on the top are very well done and the table is nice and heavy (sturdy). I don't feel like I will set too much on it and break it EVER! The bottom shelf is nice if you don't have kids that will throw stuff all over the place, but in my case I primarily use the top of the table to put remotes, drinks, ect and it looks great doing it!
customer_reviews.author: Craig Atterberry

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY- save your money
customer_reviews.text: This product seemed nice at first when assembling it but it is not sturdy, not feasible- the base was cracking just screwing pieces into it. And the little locking joints do not work. I’m afraid I just wasted almost $400 and 5 hours of my times. Also pieces came in damaged, and they were painted over with white... so seems like they shipped it out that way. Also I am a small female so it’s not like I am drilling into the materials. Furthermore I have assembled a lot of furniture- the instructions don’t have words, very confusing and not clear causing the assembly to be near impossible.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis

customer_reviews.title: Overall it looks nice but could be sturdier.
customer_reviews.text: It arrived damaged despite the company's copious amounts of packaging to protect the product. It wasn't so damaged that it couldn't be assembled, but I will have to touch up several areas with paint to cover dings and cracks. The connecting hardware caused some of the wood to crack so it wasn't very sturdy. I ended up adding wood glue to several areas to help with sturdiness. Overall it looks nice, but I'm not sure I'd buy from this company again.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Riney

customer_reviews.title: Missing one anchor screw but I don't care, I love it!
customer_reviews.text: Was missing ONE Anchor for the top. Besides that, this is a wonderful coffee table for our space. I will say, it was originally 156.00 but I was able to order it in the morning for 109.00. I am not dissatisfied, this is a lovely coffee table. Hubs even said this was one of the best quality wood items I have ever purchased off of Amazon lol. He even seems pleased with my purchase. Whew.
customer_reviews.author: Nitasha Mease

customer_reviews.title: Up and running in less than an hour.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as both a coffee table and a hobby table as I work on a lot of home projects. It took less than an hour to assemble and has been very sturdy so far. The look goes well with the rest of my furniture too and I couldn't argue the price. I would suggest during assembly of not tightening the screws/bolts too strong as they can pop out of the pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Kirsch

customer_reviews.title: I wasn’t expecting anything fantastic considering the price point
customer_reviews.text: The box came extremely mangled, so I was pleasantly surprised when I opened it and nothing was totally destroyed. I wasn’t expecting anything fantastic considering the price point, but the reviews were decent so I decided to buy it. There were a few issues with flimsy hardware and two of the top pieces don’t meet, so there’s a small gap in the table top. Otherwise, it’s a pretty good coffee table and it matches my living room nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Big and loving it !
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this coffee table. It’s very study. The assembly wasn’t so bad BUT that’s because I used a power drill. Screwing by hand was rather frustrating and time consuming, I would not recommend doing that. The wood also scratches up rather easy on hardwood. I was the only one assembling it so there a few more dings she scratches because I was dragging it around my hardwood floor. When it’s put together it’s too heavy and too wide to carry.
customer_reviews.author: K. PERK.

customer_reviews.title: Not the best quality
customer_reviews.text: We‘re having this table for about 6 month and this happened after almost 2 month of buying it! I should mention that we eat our meals in front of TV and on this table, so plates might be the reason but still... And the 3rd picture is for a time something stuck to it really lightly and when we peeled it off, it took the table’s color with itself.
customer_reviews.author: Bita

customer_reviews.title: I love this coffee table so much
customer_reviews.text: I love this coffee table so much! It arrived as expected. All parts were included and the color is wonderful! I was able to drag the box inside myself and put the entire table together myself. The only reason not a five star is one of the corners split to my disappointment while assembling the table. I was able to glue it but doubt the corner will last as long as it should. Nonetheless I love the look so much!
customer_reviews.author: Nm12

customer_reviews.title: Low quality
customer_reviews.text: It’s ok, I was expecting better quality for what I paid. It took my husband about two hours to assemble. The directions are picture only. It looks good assembled, but being all pressed fiberboard not sure it will last. It came damaged a bit and when assembling one of the feet cracked down the middle. Looks ok once assembled so I will keep it.
customer_reviews.author: Catie

customer_reviews.title: Quality cabinet, budget price
customer_reviews.text: I love this cabinet. We have rather expensive furniture & a new home. Finding an affordable cabinet that that fit my needs & my decor that didn't look cheap wasn't easy. I didnt wantvto spend $600 on a cabinet to store pantry overflow, but it had to LOOK like i did. This cabinet did exactly that! If assembled properly itvis very solid & looks far more expensive than it is. It holds quite a lot for its size.
customer_reviews.author: LANCE S

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Table for an Amazing Price
customer_reviews.text: This coffee table is amazing. My husband and I wanted to get something inexpensive that looked pretty nice. We were shocked at how nice this looked when we put it together. Easy to assemble and looks amazing. I highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Aly S

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice if you don't look close, cheap particle board falling apart
customer_reviews.text: Was a bear to put together. Convoluted and extensive instructions. We had to tear it apart 2 times to put pieces back to where they "should have been". When I screwed in on the sides, the sides would bow near the intersections. And, the sides split in some sections. Very poor quality. It "looks good" as long as you don't notice the chipped pain on the corners with the smashed in rounded corners.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Quality matches the price
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. Most of the wooden legs and pieces are chipped and have dents. The bottom shelf isn’t very sturdy and cannot support a lot of weight. We needed a large size decent coffee table for our apartment and this fits the bill.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the price. I’m a single woman and I assembled this cabinet alone. That said, obviously the cabinet can be assembled by one person; however I would recommend two people work together to assemble this unit. I didn’t have any damaged materials as in some of the other reviews. I added a chalk board sticker to the interior of my door for shopping lists. A drill will make assembly easier. If you’ve never put anything together, or if you are assembling alone, this will be hard and I would recommend hiring someone to assemble for you. Overall, I would recommend this purchase. Great amount of storage without looking obtrusive.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca McCarthy

customer_reviews.title: You get what you paid for
customer_reviews.text: The furniture itself is very cheap and easily chips but thats not my issue. Mine came with a faulty fireplace which is the only reason why I decided to order this. The heat only works for 2 mins then shuts off and displays the codes “E3”. I followed the instructions to resolve the issue but it keeps happening. Hope I can get a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin E

customer_reviews.title: Really nice end table that isn't just particle board
customer_reviews.text: This stand is absolutely fantastic. It is a great deal for the price and otherworldly sturdy. I weigh 323lbs and I sat on it comfortably. I wanted to test it's durability and it passed with flying colors. It is also a breeze to put together. My wife and I did the first one in 31 minutes and I did the second solo in 24 minutes. I recommend a power screwdriver for this one, but that's about all you'll need.
customer_reviews.author: kevin

customer_reviews.title: It’s a no for me
customer_reviews.text: The fire place works well! But there were parts that when screwing them in it wouldn’t hold and the screw had to be replace by larger ones that I had to purchase separately! Part 2 would not lock no matter what we did! This was the most frustrating thing I ever built! And wouldn’t recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: giselle

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected...chipped, etc
customer_reviews.text: A lot of chips and paint missing on the black pieces. It does not seem as sturdy as I expected. Many of the bolts were stripped so we had to make do with missing pieces or try to match at a hardware store. It looks nice but I feel like I'll have to replace it in a year. I don't think it will last long sadly
customer_reviews.author: MLL_PA

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: The package arrived quickly and was VERY heavy. I put it together alone. Pictures are accurate. Took me about 45 minutes. It's so spacious and everything about the table is beautiful. The only defect is there is a hairline crack near one of the support legs on underside. So I will have to keep my eye on that. Beautiful otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Shannel

customer_reviews.title: Check parts - you will likely need replacements
customer_reviews.text: I like the storage cabinet, but just know you get what you pay for. This is a pain to put together, and you will likely have damaged pieces. We did get replacement pieces, but some of those were also damaged, and then the next time around they sent us the wrong pieces, so overall this was a pain to get all put together and took over a month in all to have what we wanted.
customer_reviews.author: SmileyMeg

customer_reviews.title: I would love to give this zero stars but that is not possible.
customer_reviews.text: Total junk. Made out of complete particle board and not good quality at that. Cracked in multiple places while trying to assemble. Do not buy. The bad thing is it was so difficult to unpack that it will be impossible to send back. Total waste of money. Thanks Americant.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Piece of junk
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this product, and it does look nice, but several pieces cracked while assembling. Screws didn't fit right. Had to buy different screws to get them to tighten. Pieces don't fit together correctly. Had to order several replacement parts from the manufacturer. They were very helpful, but I would not purchase this item. It's cheaply made.
customer_reviews.author: Catie

customer_reviews.title: While it looks great assembling this was a PAIN
customer_reviews.text: While it looks great assembling this was a PAIN. Took multiple hours and often times I needed help just getting the steps done. Definitely not something you can assemble yourself quickly. We put ours together without the feet and bottom bar to better fit under our counter. Wine compartments hold 2 bottles each.
customer_reviews.author: LK

customer_reviews.title: Wow!  Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Don’t usually do reviews but this is a winner! Great look for an itsy bitsy price. After furniture shopping for several weekends looking for a square coffee table and not finding anything with clean lines and a modern vibe, we found this here and love it! Easy to assemble and works well with our furniture.
customer_reviews.author: kygurl02

customer_reviews.title: This table is beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I honestly ordered this table thinking that it would be kind of cheap quality. But for the price I wanted to try anyways. It arrived quickly and was super easy to assemble, and I'm so happy to say that I was so wrong and that the quality of this table is outstanding. I have three kids two dogs and two cats and a month later this table does not have one scratch on it. It's nice and heavy and very sturdy no wiggling at all. If you want a beautiful table that isn't going to break or buckle with everyday life... I highly recommend this one
customer_reviews.author: Trisha Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Exactly What I Wanted
customer_reviews.text: The assembly said it would take 2 people to put it together...it doesn’t. I did it by myself in 30 minutes and all I needed was a Phillips head screwdriver, which was a pleasant surprise. It arrived quickly with no damage to the parts and looks great in my living room. Exactly as described. It has a center support for the bottom but not the top, which appears to ultimately be a design flaw. Seeing as it will be supporting weight from the top I don’t foresee it being an issue. No complaints here!
customer_reviews.author: Catfish Bubblegum

customer_reviews.title: Defective, poorly constructed, unable to attach pieces
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed and frustrated. First, I was sent the completely wrong product. Second, when the correct product arrived, there was damage to one of the board and the piece could not be fully constructed. See photos. There are supposed to be holes in the bottom of the legs to put these screws in to attach the top and bottom pieces of the coffee table. There are no holes. Poor construction throughout the piece, poorly made. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sit and Sip
customer_reviews.text: Great little side table for the office. We wanted something that blended with our gray walls and distressed floor. Perfect piece! It sits at a great level and has enough surface area to decorate and still provide space for a drink or snack. Sturdy product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Russell Duke

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful modern coffee table
customer_reviews.text: I loved the look of this coffee table and the price is incredible! I will say, it was extremely difficult to put together - even for my boyfriend AND I. On parts 9 and 10 (legs) the holes were too small for the screws provided and it was extremely hard to put together. After a few blisters, it's up and beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: Chels

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: It was a little tough to assemble by myself because some of the pieces are really heavy. However I'm very happy with it. It's sturdy, nice looking, and has plenty of storage for games, movies, and electronics. The hardware for the doors is adjustable in case it's not quite flush/even. Just follow the directions that tell you which screws to tighten or loosen to fix the problem. Easy peasy. I was able to put it together by myself in an hour and a half and I've had it for almost a year now. This will easily last me plenty more years to come.
customer_reviews.author: M. Conrad

customer_reviews.title: Everything I was expecting and more!
customer_reviews.text: Great price, easy to build and great quality! I highly recommend :)
customer_reviews.author: Myrna Reyes

customer_reviews.title: Piece of Particle board CRAP!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Piece of particle board CRAP! Not worth the price or the head ache. Pain to put together. Came in like 100 pieces and everything was split or would split as you assembled. DONT BUY. My husband said “a strong fart would knock it over haha”
customer_reviews.author: Nathan B.

customer_reviews.title: Great Coffee Table
customer_reviews.text: This table is an amazing table for the low price. I wasn't expecting much but the quality is very good and the table looks better than in the pictures. I'm so pleased with the coffee table that I just purchased the end tables to match!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Marie

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Quality materials.  Easy enough to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, easy but tedious to put together. Be careful and not over tighten the screws, they can strip easily. After everything thing including the back pieces are In place it is very sturdy. Very pleased with this purchase and love the look.
customer_reviews.author: JCrump

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: Looks great and seems sturdy. We discovered a good size chip on one of the bottom black pieces but were more than halfway put together when we saw it. So make sure you inspect all the pieces before you start
customer_reviews.author: Sandra D.

customer_reviews.title: Coffee table looks very decent, tough to assemble
customer_reviews.text: One star less because putting it together takes time. It came in so many pieces. You need help to do it as it gets heavier while assembling. But it looks good, very functional, simplistic coffee table. The edges are sharp, if you bump other furniture by mistake it will chip.
customer_reviews.author: D. S.

customer_reviews.title: Great table, great quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: This table is beautiful in our living room! It was fairly easy to put together, just pay attention to the instructions. It is sturdy and great quality for the price. We also bought the matching end tables and are very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Adkins

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy table, stay away
customer_reviews.text: Great looking table, but poorly designed. First, it took me well over an hour to assemble it (it has a ton of screws). The irony is that all these screws get loose very quickly and do not provide any rigidity. This is made worse by the fact that the top and bottom of the table consist of 3 separate panels. Basically, you have to be ready to have to strengthen these screws every month or so or have a table with gaps between panels that moves all the time you touch it.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandr Demchuk

customer_reviews.title: Nice table for the price
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quick, in a smaller than expected box, top and bottom is 3 pieces. I put it together in about 30 minutes alone, instructions are clear and all parts easy to ID. Nice table, fit our area well, pretty heavy to do it does not move around.
customer_reviews.author: A Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality For The Price
customer_reviews.text: Arrived nicely packaged with no broken parts or issues. Easy to put together and great for our living room space between our two couches. We were happily surprised with how high quality the table looks for the price tag. The table has been put together for about 3 weeks now and we are starting to notice a slight droop in the middle wood panel on the table top, but for how minor the issue is and for how cheap the table is we don't mind.
customer_reviews.author: Mik

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Cabinet
customer_reviews.text: This cabinet looks beautiful and we decided to leave the doors off. The only thing we had an issue with was there were not enough #13 screws and we had to search through screws in our garage to find something similar but it turned out great!
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Good table for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great table for the price! It did come with a nick in the paint on the base but otherwise it looks great. It is a cheaper table so expect that. Install wasn’t too bad but it definitely went faster with two people !
customer_reviews.author: Natalle

customer_reviews.title: You must buy!
customer_reviews.text: I love this table!!! Really fills up the empty space it’s large in so beautiful!!! The table took my husband 1 hour 30 min ish! To assemble! The only thing was it was hard to screw some pieces in to the point he got whips on his hand! But overall the table came out nice! Will be buying the side coffee table in the future worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffaney

customer_reviews.title: Heavy, sturdy and attractive table, though it may come with some nicks or scratches.
customer_reviews.text: Extremely pleasantly surprised by this table. It's a gray-brown neutral color that goes with practically anything and extremely sturdy. It took some time to put together (about an hour), but it wasn't hard for me to do it myself. There were a couple of nicks in the black wood panels, where light colored wood showed through -- that was easy to paint over.
customer_reviews.author: J. Inouye

customer_reviews.title: Nice Rustic Coffee Table !
customer_reviews.text: I am an avid amazon shopper and always read and appreciate reviews on items I’m looking to buy. This coffee table is gorgeous for the price and a great piece if you need something affordable. It’s a little smaller height wise than I expected but still fits very well. It gives my living space a fresh look and I’m overall very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Charisalin

customer_reviews.title: Challenging to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Took quite long to assemble and there is something not right about the cams and dowels. The holes where they sit don't seem to be deep enough and when you turn them they start pulling out of their place. It takes quite a bit of patience to build but I like the end result well enough. One of the feet was per-drilled from the wrong end and I didn't notice until too late. I turned a screw into it and it split in half.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Take your time
customer_reviews.text: So I saw a lot of mixed reviews- but this cabinet is great- I really took my time putting it together as I think you should. I messed up the back a little bit and have some excess hanging but no one would notice- otherwise it is a great size and although it is smaller than I thought it would be- it holds a lot and really has added a nice touch to our house. Solid wood- and pretty easy construction- just make sure you have space to spread out and follow the pictures closely.
customer_reviews.author: Joanna Floribus

customer_reviews.title: worth it
customer_reviews.text: Made very well, beautiful colors. It with stands a 2 and 4 year old hitting it with toys and spilling juice boxes, ice cream and milk. Those are my concerns with all furniture. I bought corner gards because they are sharp. Just wipe clean with Clorox wipes.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Surprising Quality
customer_reviews.text: Love the finished product! Took me roughly 3hrs to assemble, not complicated, just time consuming for one person who's not very strong. Once assembled it looks very nice. The fireplace doesn't look cheesy like many I found in this price range. The heater kicks on quickly and the timer is an added bonus! Assembly note: The doors are adjustable so it can take a little time to get just right.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Goodish
customer_reviews.text: This table is very good looking but it isn’t sturdy and is falling apart after a few months. Also, if you spill anything on it the spill drips through the top to the bottom and you can’t really clean in between the boards.
customer_reviews.author: jmk12489

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! TV is 50in. Took 4 hours to assemble by myself (not an expert in putting these things together). Seemed a little wobbly until it was all together then it’s completely solid. Good quality but had a few screws strip the pre-positioned holes. Overall easy if you’re used to Ikea type directions. Power tool definitely recommended for this project.
customer_reviews.author: Mallory Gibson

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: I love this for my kitchen pantry. The only thing is it's not sturdy enough to store lots of canned food on the shelves but great for lighter storage items.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful side table.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband, he loved it! I put a basket underneath for all of the remote controls and other such nonsense that accumulates in a living room. It took the two of us to build it as it was difficult to make it sturdy otherwise. It is stable, the correct height for my couches and it does not look cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Takes a long time to assemble
customer_reviews.text: This tv stand is very nice and is good quality. I love the color and it is wider than my last stand which is a plus. The reason I gave it 4 stars is because it took my husband forever to put it together and he is very handy at assembling things. He also said the instructions where a little confusing but he likes the stand also.
customer_reviews.author: rae

customer_reviews.title: Meh it's ok
customer_reviews.text: There were superficial dents in the legs upon unboxing. Over tightened one screw which caused a blowout. Thankfully neither of these are noticeable when upright. For the money... not bad but would expect a little higher quality...
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Macchia

customer_reviews.title: Bottom shelves fit records
customer_reviews.text: IT FITS STANDARD RECORDS. I wanted to make sure my TV stand had a spot for records that could stand up and I couldn't find anything about that. You can fit records standing up on the bottom shelves without issue. It looks great, assembly is straightforward, and the end product is sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: sgbolt

customer_reviews.title: Nope don't do it
customer_reviews.text: Some of the wood came already SPLIT..... cheap parts (I've put plenty of furniture together) and the instructions were the absolute WORST.... just a vague pic of what should go where! I'll stick to Sauder from now on!
customer_reviews.author: OhSueZanna

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of this, and the fireplace is great! But I’ve only had it two months and already the heater is making a really annoying knocking sound. Wouldn’t recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan W

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this table !!! it's very sturdy and easy to put together .
customer_reviews.author: cj

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and easy to build
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my family room in the basement, it’s very sturdy and was easy to build. I actually built this while I was 40wks pregnant and about to pop!
customer_reviews.author: Deirdre

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Compact but spacious!
customer_reviews.text: I read a ton of mixed reviews but still decided to purchase it.... and I’m glad I did! I love it! As someone else mentioned, don’t rush building it- do it slowly and correctly and it will come out just fine. Highly recommend! I wish I had more room for the whole set!
customer_reviews.author: Neeks

customer_reviews.title: Coffee Table -
customer_reviews.text: My new coffee table arrived yesterday and I was so excited... easy to assemble and man oh man, looks so amazing. Gorgeous strong and magnificent material. I am so happy!
customer_reviews.author: jerry thompson

customer_reviews.title: Pros and Cons
customer_reviews.text: Let me start by saying that one of the best features about this cabinet is that by the time you finish assembling the 32,000 pieces that it comes in, you are certified for an engineering degree from MIT. But seriously. It looks cute, it's obviously cheap, it's a lot of work (like a lot... whole ******** lot), it gets you a lot of compliments, if you don't use the wall anchor, it's rocky.
customer_reviews.author: Matty K

customer_reviews.title: Love it so far!
customer_reviews.text: It's great! I put it together by myself. 2 people would have been a little bit more of a help, as I had to use my foot and hand to push 2 pieces together and screw it in w my other hand, but wasn't a problem. All pieces came, no damages. Tip for the tiny wood pieces: I used a hammer and a nail file on them to make the boards fit together.
customer_reviews.author: devon

customer_reviews.title: DAMAGED TABLE
customer_reviews.text: I like the tables we bought except one of them came damaged. I would have given a higher score but the damage really sucks especially since we’ve been waiting for them for 6 weeks because they were back ordered. Pretty disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Tommy C.

product_meta.title: Ameriwood Home Carver Bar Cabinet, Black
product_meta.description: Color:Black| Style Name:Bar CabinetThe Ameriwood Home Carver Bar Cabinet is a must-have for any entertainment space. The cabinet is designed specifically for holding wine bottles, drink glasses and everything else you need to host an unforgettable party. Constructed of painted MDF and laminated particleboard, this cabinet sturdily stands at 37.1”h x 36”w x 18.2”d. Two adults are recommended for proper assembly.
feature_bullets: Entertain in style with the Ameriwood Home Carver Bar Cabinet
Bar cabinet dimensions – 36” W x 18.2” D x 37.1” H | Weight – 103.2 lbs. | Bottle Cubbies – 18 | Drawers – 2 | Shelves – 2
The bar cabinet is made from painted MDF and laminated particleboard
A black finish and distressed brown woodgrain accents form a stunning design
The cabinet is designed specifically for holding wine bottles, drink glasses and everything else you need to host an unforgettable party

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars1,363 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
